sqlMap.delete:
/*srvcrGenItmValDtls.deleteSrvcrGenItmValDtls*/ delete from srvcr_gen_itm_val_dtls a where srvcr_id = #srvcrId#
and exists(select 1 from srvcr_idnf_itm_val_dtls x where a.srvcr_id = x.srvcr_id and a.idnf_itm_val_dtls_sn = x.idnf_itm_val_dtls_sn and x.idnf_itm_val1 = #idnfItmVal1#
and x.idnf_itm_val2 = #idnfItmVal2#
and x.idnf_itm_val3 = #idnfItmVal3#
and x.idnf_itm_val4 = #idnfItmVal4#
and x.idnf_itm_val5 = #idnfItmVal5#
and x.idnf_itm_val6 = #idnfItmVal6#
and x.idnf_itm_val7 = #idnfItmVal7#
and x.idnf_itm_val8 = #idnfItmVal8#
and x.idnf_itm_val9 = #idnfItmVal9#
and x.idnf_itm_val10 = #idnfItmVal10#
)
sqlMap.insert:
/*srvcrGenItmValDtls.insertSrvcrGenItmValDtls*/ insert into srvcr_gen_itm_val_dtls( srvcr_id , idnf_itm_val_dtls_sn , critm_id , critm_val , frst_crt_usrid , frst_crt_ptm , frst_crt_pgm_id , last_chg_usrid , last_chg_ptm , last_chg_pgm_id )values
( #[].srvcrId# , #[].idnfItmValDtlsSn# , upper(#[].critmId#) , #[].critmVal# , '관리자' , now() , '관리자' , '관리자' , now() , '관리자' )
